article_metadata.description: John Boehner’s resignation from Congress and as Speaker of the House and the withdrawal by House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy from succeeding him are distractions from the people’s work in Washington, but the national media alert on the chaos like my Labrador’s fascination with squirrels.
article_metadata.author: Bill Knight

og.description: John Boehner’s resignation from Congress and as Speaker of the House and the withdrawal by House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy from succeeding him
og.title: Government shutdown averted – for now
